metadata.title: commons-configuration: StackOverflowError adding property in AbstractListDelimiterHandler.flattenIterator() (low)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A vulnerability was found in Apache Commons-Configuration, where a Stack Overflow Error can occur when adding a property in AbstractListDelimiterHandler.flattenIterator(). This issue could allow an attacker to corrupt memory or execute a denial of service attack by crafting malicious property that triggers an out-of-bounds write issue when processed by the vulnerable method.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 6 is installed
commons-configuration is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
